varselforgroenland.name: Warning for Greenlandic seaareas
varselforgroenland.text:
There is storm warning for Nunap Isuata Kangia, Nunap Isuata Kitaa and Nunarsuit.
There is gale warning for Daneborg, Kangikajik, Aputiteeq, Kulusuk, Timmiarmiut, Narsalik, Meqquitsoq and Kiatak.

gyldighed.name: Validhoures
gyldighed.text: Forecast, valid to Sunday the 14. September, 00 UTC..

oversigt.name: Synoptic situation
oversigt.text: A low, 985 hPa, just southwest of Greenland is moving slowly towards east. A low, 990 hPa, north of Daneborg is moving towards north.

udsigtfordaneborg.name: Forecast for Daneborg
udsigtfordaneborg.text: Gale from west and northwest 10 to 15 m/s, during the afternoon decreasing to between 5 and 10 m/s, and becoming south and southwest, this night in southern part up to 13 m/s. Mainly good visibility.

wavesdaneborg.name: Waves Daneborg
wavesdaneborg.text: Significant wave height: 4 m. Swells: 3 m.

udsigtforkangikajik.name: Forecast for Kangikajik
udsigtforkangikajik.text: Southwest and west, 8 to 13 m/s, locally up to gale, 15 m/s, decreasing and this afternoon becoming southwest and south, 5 to 10 m/s, this evening in northern part locally up to gale 15 m/s. Mainly good visibility

waveskangikajik.name: Waves Kangikajik
waveskangikajik.text: Significant wave height: 5 m. Swells: 4 m.

udsigtforaputiteeq.name: Forecast for Aputiteeq
udsigtforaputiteeq.text: Mainly south and southwest, 3 to 10 m/s. This afternoon in southern part between southeast and northeast, 8 to 13 m/s, locally up to gale, 15 m/s. Rain from south with moderate visibility.

wavesaputiteeq.name: Waves Aputiteeq
wavesaputiteeq.text: Significant wave height: 6 m. Swells: 4 m.

udsigtforkulusuk.name: Forecast for Kulusuk
udsigtforkulusuk.text: Southeast and south, increasing to gale, 10 to 15 m/s, in western part however north and northeast. From late in the afternoon, in the whole water, gale between northeast and southeast, 13 to 18 m/s. Rain with moderate to poor visibility.

waveskulusuk.name: Waves Kulusuk
waveskulusuk.text: Significant wave height: 4 m. Swells: 4 m.

udsigtfortimmiarmiut.name: Forecast for Timmiarmiut
udsigtfortimmiarmiut.text: Gale from south and southeast, increasing to between 13 and 18 m/s, this evening again a little decreasing. In western part however around north, increasing to gale, 10 to 15 m/s. Rain with moderate to poor visibility, this night some improving visibility from south.

wavestimmiarmiut.name: Waves Timmiarmiut
wavestimmiarmiut.text: Significant wave height: 7 m. Swells: 5 m.

udsigtfornunapisuatakangia.name: Forecast for Nunap Isuata Kangia
udsigtfornunapisuatakangia.text: Gale from south and southeast, 15 to 20 m/s. This afternoon transiently decreasing, but late in the afternoon becoming west, and increasing to between 18 and 23 m/s, from this evening storm 20 to 25 m/s. Rain with moderate to poor visibility, this afternoon improving visibility apart from rain showers.

waveskangia.name: Waves Nunap Isuata Kangia
waveskangia.text: Significant wave height: 9 m. Swells: 6 m.

udsigtfornunapisuatakitaa.name: Forecast for Nunap Isuata Kitaa
udsigtfornunapisuatakitaa.text: Gale from southeast and south, 10 to 18 m/s, transiently decreasing, but late in morning becoming northwest, increasing to storm 20 to 25 m/s, this night west and northwest. Rain with moderate to poor visibility, this afternoon improving visibility apart from rain showers.

waveskitaa.name: Waves Isuata Kitaa
waveskitaa.text: Significant wave height: 9 m. Swells: 6 m.

udsigtfornunarsuit.name: Forecast for Nunarsuit
udsigtfornunarsuit.text: At first in eastern part gale around southeast, 15 to 20 m/s, otherwise cyclonic variable, up to 13 m/s. This morning becoming northwest, at first in western part, increasing to storm 20 to 25 m/s, late in the afternoon a little decreasing. Rain with moderate to poor visibility, this afternoon improving visibility apart from rain showers.

wavesnunarsuit.name: Waves Nunarsuit
wavesnunarsuit.text: Significant wave height: 8 m. Swells: 5 m.

udsigtfornarsalik.name: Forecast for Narsalik
udsigtfornarsalik.text: Early in the day in southeastern part gale around southeast 15 to 20 m/s, otherwise gale around northwest, 15 to 20 m/s, in southern part locally up to 23 m/s. Rain with moderate to poor visibility, this afternoon improving visibility apart from rain showers.

wavesnarsalik.name: Waves Narsalik
wavesnarsalik.text: Significant wave height: 7 m. Swells: 4 m.

udsigtformeqquitsoq.name: Forecast for Meqquitsoq
udsigtformeqquitsoq.text: Gale from north and northwest, 10 to 18 m/s, strongest in southern part, late in the evening decreasing and this night becoming west, 8 to 13 m/s. Locally rain or rain showers, moderate to good visibility.

wavesmeqquitsoq.name: Waves Meqquitsoq
wavesmeqquitsoq.text: Significant wave height: 4 m. Swells: 3 m.

udsigtforattu.name: Forecast for Attu
udsigtforattu.text: Variable, below 8 m/s, from this afternoon north and northwest, increasing to between 5 and 10 m/s, this evening becoming west. Locally rain showers or sleet showers, moderate to good visibility.

wavesattu.name: Waves Attu
wavesattu.text: Significant wave height: 2 m. Swells: 2 m.

udsigtforuiffaq.name: Forecast for Uiffaq
udsigtforuiffaq.text: Mainly between south and west, up to 10 m/s. Locally rain showers or sleet showers, moderate to good visibility.

wavesuiffaq.name: Waves Uiffaq
wavesuiffaq.text: Significant wave height: 2 m. Swells: 1,5 m.

udsigtforqimusseriarsuaq.name: Forecast for Qimusseriarsuaq
udsigtforqimusseriarsuaq.text: In northwestern part around southeast, 8 to 13 m/s, slowly decreasing to between 5 and 10 m/s, otherwise between southeast and northeast, 3 to 8 m/s. From this evening, in the whole water, variable, below 8 m/s. Locally rain showers or sleet showers, moderate to good visibility.

wavesqimusseriarsuaq.name: Waves Qimusseriarsuaq
wavesqimusseriarsuaq.text: Significant wave height: 2 m. Swells: 1,5 m.

udsigtforkiatak.name: Forecast for Kiatak
udsigtforkiatak.text: Around southeast, 8 to 13 m/s, locally up to gale, 15 m/s, this afternoon decreasing and becoming east and northeast, 3 to 8 m/s. A few wintry showers, but otherwise good visibility.

waveskiatak.name: Waves Kiatak
waveskiatak.text: Significant wave height: 2,5 m. Swells: 2 m.
